# MyDesigner

> Unlimited design subscription service by Sukratu. Based in Pune, India, serving clients globally. Fixed monthly pricing for UI/UX design, Webflow/Framer development, and graphic design.

## What We Do

MyDesigner provides unlimited design requests for a fixed monthly fee. No per-project pricing, no long-term contracts. Subscribe, submit requests, receive professional designs within 24-72 hours.

## Services

- [Product Design](/services.html): Web app UI, mobile app UI, website design
- [No-Code Development](/services.html): Webflow and Framer website development
- [Graphic Design](/services.html): Brand identity, social media, presentations, print
- [Additional Services](/services.html): Wireframing, prototyping, infographics, case studies, emailers

## Pricing

| Plan | Price | Requests at Once | Turnaround |
|------|-------|------------------|------------|
| Daily | $80/day (min 3 days) | 1 | 24-72h |
| Starter | $1,400/month | 1 | 48-72h |
| Growth | $2,600/month | 2 | 24-48h |
| Scale | $3,800/month | 3 | 24-48h |
| Yearly | $15,000/year | 1 | 48-72h |

All plans include unlimited requests, unlimited revisions, and full source files.

## Key Facts

- Founded by Sukratu
- Based in Pune, India
- Serves clients in India, United States, and globally
- Fixed monthly pricing from $1,400-$3,800/month
- No long-term contracts â€” cancel anytime
- Includes Webflow and Framer development (not just design)
- Unlimited revisions on all plans

## Clients

Notable clients include Dentsu, Calfus, Talabat, and USA Table Tennis.

## Comparisons

- **vs DesignJoy:** Lower price ($1,400 vs $4,995), includes development
- **vs Penji:** Higher price but includes web development
- **vs ManyPixels:** Includes Webflow/Framer development, no motion graphics
- **vs Kimp:** Bundled design + development, no video editing

## Contact

- Website: https://mydesigner.gg
- Location: Pune, India
